explanation: [0-0] A gray kitten wearing a blue striped shirt is in front of a transparent container filled with silver thumbtacks. Below the thumbtacks is a red toy. The kitten has a toy car under its left hand, and there is a white toy duck on the table behind it. In the lower right corner of the screen, there is a half-length photo of the kitten.

[0-2] The picture switches to a purple toy car driving towards the left side of the screen. As the toy car drives forward, dominoes fall in turn behind it. Colorful dominoes are arranged on the ground, and a photo of the kitten is standing by the wall.

[0-2] The picture switches to a purple toy car driving towards the left side of the screen. As the toy car drives forward, dominoes fall in turn behind it. Colorful dominoes are arranged on the ground, and a photo of the kitten is standing by the wall.
[2-4] A pair of feet appears on the right side of the screen, the right foot steps on a green domino, the green domino falls, and the dominoes behind fall one after another.
[2-4] A pair of feet appears on the right side of the screen, the right foot steps on a green domino, the green domino falls, and the dominoes behind fall one after another.

[4-8] The picture switches to the kitten holding a purple domino in its right hand, with the already arranged dominoes in front of it. The kitten leans forward, then sits up straight, opens its mouth, and looks shocked. The camera turns to a circle of dominoes on the ground. The dominoes are knocked down, leaving only three orange dominoes and a green cactus standing. The kitten gets angry after seeing it, its face turns red, and it leans forward and swings left and right.
